Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Victoria C. Gould "tkerv"
Reviews.Content: I could have gotten another phone that was better than this one for less money. It's screen is really hard to use and the product doesn't even look like the phone advertised. I can't send it back because I need a phone and it's not even worth the time. But it really has put a dent in the amount of time I use my phone. Really, don't buy this product.

Reviews.Title: Very unhappy with product
Reviews.Author: Not pleased
Reviews.Content: I thought I was getting a pretty good phone for the price--but when it came it looked like a toy phone..very cheap feeling. very unhappy with it, so I sent it back...Want my money back for it and the shipping.

Reviews.Title: Did not order
Reviews.Author: Patricia Tristan
Reviews.Content: Did not even order this item. I don't have anything else i can say about this sorry for the waste of time
